imdb.plot outline: What if a social media delivery service actually existed? What if instead of just bickering back and forth on Twitter or Facebook, people could have their message delivered in person? Tune in as this show answers those questions and a lot more in every episode.
imdb.title: Have a Bad Day
plot: What if a social media delivery service actually existed? What if instead of just bickering back and forth on Twitter or Facebook, people could have their message delivered in person? Tune in as this show answers those questions and a lot more in every episode.::Blackie Wilson
